column7: Focuses on understanding the historical and contemporary creative practices of playwrights, directors, and dramaturgs. Provides a brief overview of theatre history and theory for understanding critical concepts and approaches that inform contemporary theatrical practices. Students will develop creative projects as well as critical analyses in support of course objectives. Credit not given for both THEA 122 and THEA 101. Credit not given for both THEA 122 and THEA 102.
column9: Credit not given for both THEA 122 and THEA 101. Credit not given for both THEA 122 and THEA 102.
